content: design is worked first as a hat - knit flat and seamed - and then stitches are picked up on each side for the scarf sections you will need a large-eyed sewing needle for finishing finished measurements hat section - approximately 17 43 cm in circumference x 8 3 21 cm high attached scarf - approximately 6 3 16 cm wide x 30 7 78 cm long yarn used wool and the gang take care mohair - 5 balls
